snippet.title: Live Coding: Minecraft backup script in Ruby (Day 5)
snippet.description:
Writing a backup script for the Minecraft server in Ruby. This script backs up the server files, the database, syncs them remotely, and rotates the backups to preserve disk space. Code currently available at https://github.com/NanoDano/MinecraftBackupScript

GitHub: https://www.github.com/DevDungeon
Support the stream: https://streamlabs.com/devdungeon
Join Discord: https://discord.gg/JWsSHJC
